meanings.sent1: She rewoven the torn fabric to repair it.
meanings.sent2: The old rug was rewoven to restore its beauty.
meanings.sent3: He rewoven the friendship by apologizing sincerely.
meanings.sent4: The community rewoven their bonds after the disaster.
meanings.sent5: The spider rewoven its intricate web every night.

meanings.definition: Made by weaving again or anew.
meanings.sent1: The rewoven blanket felt soft and warm.
meanings.sent2: The rewoven basket looked brand new.
meanings.sent3: She wore a rewoven dress to the party and received many compliments.
meanings.sent4: The rewoven tapestry told a story of resilience and creativity.
meanings.sent5: The rewoven rope was strong and reliable for climbing.
